messages.title: What You're Saying About Durham City
messages.content: The Aymard Family: 'I'm backing Craig and the Lib Dems, he's the only one that will give opportunity to everyone. -Victoria Aymard' The Anderson Family: 'The £800 Income tax cut I've received is making my family's life so much easier. -Michael Anderson'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £800 tax cut for 30,000 workers in Durham City.
An extra £7.8M spent on school children in Durham City since 2010.

issues.education: £1,000 to spend on every child for free school meals, giving every pupil the best start in life. Extra free nursery places providing the best start in life for many more young children.

contactInformation.address: Return free of charge to: Durham Lib Dems, Freepost RTKT-HBSU-YHYE, DH1 5XE

endorsements.endorsement: I'm backing Craig and the Lib Dems, he's the only one that will give opportunity to everyone.
The £800 Income tax cut I've received is making my family's life so much easier.

quotes.text: I'm backing Craig and the Lib Dems, he's the only one that will give opportunity to everyone.
The £800 Income tax cut I've received is making my family's life so much easier.

images.caption: The Aymard Family discussing their support for Craig.
The Anderson Family expressing the benefits of the income tax cut.
